title: Hoover HF1 Plus Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner with Turbo Suction Mode, Up to 45 Min Runtime, LED Lights, Multi-Floor Nozzle, Anti Hair Wrap, Handheld Capability, 165w [HF1P10H]
seller_info_text: Dispatched from and sold by Britannia Kart.
features: Experience ultimate versatility with this cordless vacuum cleaner. Use it as a stick vacuum for floors, then switch to a cordless handheld vacuum cleaner for stairs or your car. Lightweight, portable, and perfect for effortless home and car cleaning.
UP TO 45 MINUTES¹ RUNTIME: Plenty of time to vacuum around your home with this cordless vacuum cleaner and choose between two power modes: Turbo and Standard.
ALL FLOOR NOZZLE WITH LEDs: This cordless stick vacuum cleaner effortlessly transitions from carpet to hard floors, with integrated LEDs that light the way to hidden dust and dirt.
ANTI HAIR WRAP: The vacuum cleaner's brush bar has an integrated comb that prevents hair-wrapping.

CONVENIENT ACCESSORIES: An integrated dusting brush makes cleaning surfaces quick and easy. The crevice tool easily reaches tight spots like edges and corners. Use as a stick vacuum for floors, then switch to a cordless handheld vacuum cleaner for stairs and other off-the-floor places.
QUICK PARK & GO²: Pause cleaning by parking your cordless vacuum in a vertical position temporarily when not in use. A hassle-free solution for quick breaks.

Hoover HF1 Plus Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner Merchant video Up to 150w motor power and turbo mode for efficient cleaning. Get where you need to go with a cordless design and long-lasting battery with up to 45 minutes runtime¹. Suitable to clean every type of floor in your home, from hard floors to carpets. Prevent hair wrapping around the brushbar with ANTI-TWIST technology. Previous page Next page Previous page Next page Is this cordless vacuum cleaner good for both carpets and hard floors? Yes! The HF1 Plus cordless vacuum cleaner is designed for all floor types, including carpets, hardwood and tiles. The LED floorhead lights help reveal hidden dust and dirt for a thorough clean. Does this vacuum convert to a handheld hoover? Yes! The HF1 Plus cordless vacuum cleaner instantly converts to a handheld, making it easy to clean furniture, stairs and even inside your car. The integrated dusting brush is always within reach for quick surface cleaning. Can I use this cordless vacuum in my car? Definitely! The HF1 Plus cordless vacuum cleaner transforms into a handheld portable vacuum, making it ideal for cleaning dust and debris inside your car. Does this hoover come with a charging dock? Absolutely! The HF1 Plus gives you the choice to remove the battery pack and charge it via the most convenient power socket. It can also be plugged into charge whilst on the wall mount.
